A taste of what is to come!!!


____________________________________________________________________________
> BIPS (BioInformatics In Plant Science) has been working on our semester project. Currently we are participating in Plant the Moon where student researchers from across the country come up with ideas to make regolith (moon substrate) viable for plant growth. (October 2023 - present)



Project Plan





Planted pots in our bulk density gradient


____________________________________________________________________________
> Harvest has come to an end! I had a great time this summer. I learned how to drop seed in the research planter, collected images with UAVs, did hand pollinations in the nursery fields, and hand harvested 100s of ears. Overall, lots of fun with the Washburn Lab! (September 2023)





____________________________________________________________________________
> Maize Genetics Cooperation Presentation (March 2023)

title: Madi Mitchell
text: I am currently a senior at MIZZOU studying Plant Sciences. My emphasis area is Breeding, Biology, and Biotechnology. I am also pursuing a minor in Mathematics. My hope is that this website is a living representation of my research and current professional accomplishments. Enjoy!!
